001package com.technototes.library.hardware.motor;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
004import com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDeviceGroup;
005
006/** Class for a group of motors
007 *
008 * @param <T> The type of motors to group
009 */
010@SuppressWarnings("unused")
011public class MotorGroup<T extends DcMotorSimple>
012    extends Motor<T>
013    implements HardwareDeviceGroup<Motor<T>> {
014
015    private final Motor[] followers;
016
017    /** Make a motor group
018     *
019     * @param motors The motors
020     */
021    @SafeVarargs
022    public MotorGroup(Motor<T>... motors) {
023        super(motors[0].getDevice());
024        followers = new Motor[motors.length - 1];
025        System.arraycopy(motors, 1, followers, 0, followers.length);
026    }
027
028    @Override
029    public Motor<T>[] getFollowers() {
030        return followers;
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public Motor<T>[] getAllDevices() {
035        Motor<T>[] m = new Motor[followers.length + 1];
036        m[0] = this;
037        System.arraycopy(followers, 0, m, 1, m.length - 1);
038        return m;
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public void propogate(double value) {
043        for (Motor m : followers) {
044            m.setSpeed(value);
045        }
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public void setSpeed(double speed) {
050        super.setSpeed(speed);
051        propogate(speed);
052    }
053}
